Construction.title: We're Building Something Amazing!
Construction.subtitle: Get Ready to Launch Your E-Commerce Store with Zero Effort and Very Low Costs!

Countries.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
Countries.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

Landing.title: Grow Your Brand Effortlessly with EasyStore
Landing.slogan: Build a powerful online store that adapts to any business – no coding or developer needed!
Landing.starting: Starting to sell is very easy
Landing.unlimetedProducts: Add as many products as you like
Landing.customDomains: Use your own domain or get a free one
Landing.paymant: Choose the payment gateways that you need
Landing.growBussiness: Use data-driven insights to optimize your store and boost sales
Landing.zeroTransaction: We don’t charge commission on sales
Landing.manageEase: Easily track orders, manage inventory, and fulfill orders
Landing.noCode: Create a store in minutes with our intuitive dashboard
Landing.sellEverywhere: Reach customers on social media, marketplaces, and more
Landing.searchEngine: Attract more organic traffic and reach new customers
Landing.inventorySync: Automatically sync your inventory across your online and in-person stores
Landing.featureText: EasyStore is the all-in-one solution for growing businesses. Our platform includes everything you need to start, run, and scale youronline business.
Landing.whatIsEasyStoreTitle: What is EasyStore and how does it work?
Landing.whatIsEasyStore: EasyStore is an all-in-one commerce platform built for independent business owners to start, run, and grow their businesses online, in-store, and everywhere in between. Here are just few things you can do with EasyStore: Create and customize an online store Sell in multiple places, including web, mobile, social media. Manage products, inventory, payments, and shipping. Create, execute, and analyze online marketing campaigns.
Landing.EasyStoreCost: You can try EasyStore premiun free for 14 days, no credit card required. After your trial expires, you can stay on the free plan or choose a plan that suits the size and stage of your business.
Landing.cancelAccountTitle: Can I cancel my account at any time?
Landing.cancelAccount: Yes, if you ever decide that EasyStore isn't the best ecommerce platform for your business, simply cancel your account. If you choose a 1 year subscription, you can cancel when your term commitment expires.
Landing.changePlanTitle: Can I change my plan later on?
Landing.changePlan: Yes you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you choose a monthly subscription, you can upgrade to a yearly subscription at any time or you can change to another diferent plan.
Landing.dicounts: We offer a 25% discount for yearly subscriptions if you choose the Basic, Premiun, Advanced or Enterprise plans.
Landing.countriesUseTitle: In what countries can I use EasyStore?
Landing.countriesUse: Currently only in Guatemala, but we plan to expand as soon as possible.
Landing.transaction: No, there are no transaction fees. Similarly, EasyStore is not responsible for the sale of any illegal products.
Landing.switchToEasyStoreTitle: I'm looking to switch to EasyStore. How do I get my data over?
Landing.switchToEasyStore: If you already have an ecommerce website or are using a different ecommerce platform for your business, and you plan to have any plan starting with premium, you can contact us and we will move your site.
Landing.domainNameTitle: Can I use my own domain name with EasyStore?
Landing.domainName: Yes, you can purchase a domain name within EasyStore, or use an existing one that you own. We also provide a forever free myeasystore.com domain name to all stores when they sign up.
Landing.hostingTitle: Do I get free web hosting when I open an online store?
Landing.hosting: Yes, EasyStore includes secure, unlimited ecommerce hosting on all plans.
Landing.onlineStoreTitle: Does my online store integrate with my in person store?
Landing.onlineStore: Yes, your online store automatically synchronizes with your in person store, and you manage your entire business from one dashboard. Inventory, product, and payment updates that you make in your EasyStore admin will instantly take effect.
Landing.aboutText1: At EasyStore, we empower entrepreneurs and small businesses to build and grow their online presence effortlessly.
Landing.aboutText2: Our mission is to make e-commerce accessible to everyone, whether you're starting from your living room or scaling a local store, by providing intuitive tools, seamless design options, and reliable infrastructure.
Landing.aboutText3: Built with care and a deep understanding of technology, EasyStore is driven by a passionate team of engineers dedicated to turning complex problems into elegant, user-friendly solutions. We believe that great businesses are built on simplicity, and we’re here to help you turn your ideas into impact.
Landing.founded: 2025 – Built to support the future of commerce
Landing.managed: Passionate engineers with a vision for accessible technology
Landing.headquarters: Based in Guatemala City – with a global mindset
Landing.focus: Fast setup, beautiful design, and no-code simplicity
Landing.mission: Help businesses sell online without limits
Landing.pricingTitle: Select the Ideal Plan for Your Business
Landing.pricingDescription: Discover cost-effective plans brimming with top-tier features designed to captivate your audience, foster customer loyalty, and boost your sales figures.

Products.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete these products? This action cannot be undone and the products will be permanently deleted.
Products.archiveDescription: Are you sure you want to archive these products? The products will be moved to the archived section.
Products.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
Products.nameTooLong: Product name must be 100 characters or less
Products.shortDescriptionTooShort: Short description must be at least 10 characters
Products.shortDescriptionTooLong: Short description must be 200 characters or less
Products.longDescriptionTooShort: Long description must be at least 20 characters
Products.longDescriptionTooLong: Long description must be 2000 characters or less
Products.brandTooShort: Brand must be at least 1 character
Products.brandTooLong: Brand must be 100 characters or less
Products.manufacturerTooShort: Manufacturer must be at least 1 character
Products.manufacturerTooLong: Manufacturer must be 100 characters or less
Products.coverRequired: Cover image is required and must be a valid file
Products.productTypeRequired: Product type must be either PHYSICAL or DIGITAL
Products.tagMustBeNonEmpty: Each tag must be a non-empty string
Products.tagTooLong: Each tag must be at most 50 characters long
Products.tooManyTags: You can have a maximum of 15 tags
Products.recycledPercentageMin: Recycled percentage must be at least 0
Products.networkErrorDescription: Please check your connection and try again.
Products.unexpectedErrorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Products.archiveDescriptionSingle: Are you sure you want to archive this product? The product will be moved to the archived section.

Products.restoreDescription: Are you sure you want to restore this product? The product will be restored to active status.
Products.name: Name
Products.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of the product
Products.longDescriptionPlaceholder: A detailed description of the product
Products.multipleRestoreDescription: Are you sure you want to restore these products? The products will be moved to the active section.
Products.attributeKeyRequired: Key must be at least 1 character
Products.attributeValueRequired: Value must be at least 1 character
Products.skuRequired: SKU must be a non-empty string
Products.eanInvalid: EAN must be a valid EAN-8 (8 digits) or EAN-13 (13 digits) code.
Products.isbnInvalid: ISBN must be a valid ISBN-10 (e.g., 0321765723 or 032176572X) or ISBN-13 (e.g., 9780321765723) code. Do not include hyphens.
Products.barcodeInvalid: Barcode must be a non-empty string'
Products.monthsMinValue: Months must be a non-negative integer
Products.interestRateMinValue: Interest rate must be a non-negative number
Products.warrantyCoverageRequired: Warranty coverage must be at least 20 characters
Products.warrantyCoverageMaxLength: Warranty coverage must be at most 1000 characters
Products.warrantyInstructionsRequired: Warranty instructions must be at least 20 characters
Products.warrantyInstructionsMaxLength: Warranty instructions must be at most 1000 characters
Products.variantCoverInvalidUrl: Variant cover must be a valid URL
Products.noProductsDescription: Get started by creating your first product. Add product details, images, and pricing to begin selling.

Privacy.introP1: At EasyStore, our mission is to boost commerce for all microenterprises and SMEs in Guatemala. To achieve this, we collect and use information about you and others who interact with our platform.
Privacy.introP2: This Privacy Policy will help you better understand how we collect, use and share your personal information. If we change our privacy practices, we may update this policy. If any changes are significant, we will notify you (for example, through the EasyStore control panel or by email).
Privacy.valuesP1: Trust is the foundation of the EasyStore platform. We believe that doing the right thing with your information is fundamental. Three main values guide us in the development of our products and services in Guatemala:
Privacy.valuesP2:
• Your information belongs to you: we carefully analyze what kind of information we need to provide our services and strive to limit collection to what is strictly necessary. When information is no longer required, we delete or anonymize it. In developing and improving EasyStore, our engineers work hand in hand with our privacy and security teams to ensure that privacy is always a priority. Our guiding principle is that your information belongs to you and our goal is to use it only for your benefit.
• We protect your information from third parties: If a third party requests your personal information, we will refuse to share it unless you give us your permission or we are legally obligated to do so under Guatemalan law. When we are legally required to share your personal information, we will notify you in advance, unless we are prohibited by law from doing so.
• We help merchants and partners comply with their privacy obligations: Many of the merchants and partners using EasyStore do not have a dedicated privacy team. For us, it is vital to help them meet their privacy obligations in the Guatemalan context. That's why we design our products and services to be user-friendly and privacy-friendly. We also provide clear documentation on privacy issues and respond to questions we receive regarding privacy.
Privacy.whyTitle: Why do we process your information?
Privacy.whyP1:
Generally, we process your information when necessary to fulfill a contractual obligation (for example, to process your subscription payments to use the EasyStore platform), or when we or someone we work with needs to use your personal information for a business-related reason (for example, to provide you with a service). These "legitimate interests" include:
• Risk and fraud prevention.
• Answering questions or providing other types of support.
• Helping merchants find and use apps through our app store.
• Providing and improving our products and services.
• Provide reporting and analysis.
• Test additional features or services.
• Assist with marketing, advertising or other communications.
  


We only process personal information for these "legitimate interests" after considering the potential risks to your privacy and balancing any risks with measures such as providing clear transparency into our privacy practices, giving you control over your personal information where appropriate, limiting the information we keep, limiting what we do with your information, who we send it to, how long we keep it, or the technical measures we use to protect it.

We may also process your personal information if you have given us your consent. In particular, where we cannot rely on any other lawful basis for processing, where you ask us to transfer information to a third party, where we receive your data from a third party and already have your consent, or where we are required by law to seek your consent (including in the context of some of our sales and marketing activities). At any time, you have the right to revoke your consent by modifying your communication choices, unsubscribing from our communications or contacting us.
Privacy.whereP1: EasyStore is a company operating in Guatemala, but in order to provide our services to you effectively, we may work with service providers and process data with them. This may involve your personal information being sent outside of Guatemala, including to the United States. This data may be subject to the laws of the countries to which we send it. We take steps to protect your information when we send it to other countries by ensuring that contractual and technical safeguards are in place.
Privacy.howLongTitle: How long do we keep your information?
Privacy.howLongP1:
We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collect it. In determining the appropriate retention period, we consider the amount, nature and sensitivity of your personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your personal data, the purposes for which we process your personal data and whether we can achieve those purposes by other means, as well as applicable legal requirements in Guatemala (tax regulations requiring record retention). We will also retain and use your personal information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce our policies.

If you stop using our services or delete your account, we will delete your information or store it in an aggregated and anonymous form, provided that there is no legal obligation to retain it for a specific period.

If you are a merchant operating a store powered by EasyStore and you close the store, stop paying your subscription fees or we cancel your account, we retain the store information for 1 year before we begin the deletion process.

When a customer visits or makes a purchase at a merchant's store that uses EasyStore, we act as a service provider or processor for the merchant. It is the merchant, not EasyStore, who decides how long their customers' information is retained.
Privacy.protectP1:
Our teams work tirelessly to protect your information and ensure the security and integrity of our platform. We implement technical, administrative and physical security measures, including data encryption (SSL/TLS), access controls and regular audits.

However, we all know that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. This means that we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information.
Privacy.cookiesTitle: How we use cookies and other tracking technologies
Privacy.cookiesP1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website and in providing our services to keep your session active and improve platform functionality.
Privacy.contactP1:
If you would like to inquire, submit a request or file a complaint about how we process your personal information, please contact the EasyStore support team or send us an email at the address below. If you wish to submit a legally binding request to request another person's personal information (for example, if you have a subpoena or court order), please contact us directly to receive the appropriate guidelines.

If you are a merchant, partner or visitor to the EasyStore website, and EasyStore has a direct relationship with you, EasyStore is the controller of your personal data.

If you buy something from a store powered by EasyStore or provide them with your information, the merchant is the data controller of your data, and we act as data processors on their behalf. If you have questions about how a merchant or store processes your personal information, you should contact the merchant directly or visit their privacy policy.

Terms.acceptanceP1: These Terms and Conditions of Service govern your access and use of the EasyStore platform, including all services, features and functionality we offer. EasyStore is a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform designed to help you create and manage your own online store easily and efficiently in Guatemala.
Terms.acceptanceP2: By signing up for an EasyStore account, accessing or using any part of our services, you are accepting and agreeing to comply with these Terms, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, we ask that you do not use our services.
Terms.acceptanceP3: EasyStore reserves the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated version on our website or through a notice within the platform. It is your responsibility to periodically check this page for modifications. Your continued use of or access to the Platform following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
Terms.accountIntro: To use EasyStore services, you will need to register and create an account. The following are the terms related to your EasyStore account:
Terms.accountRequirements:
2.1. Account Requirements
Legal Capacity: To create an EasyStore account, you must be a natural person over eighteen (18) years of age or a duly constituted legal entity with full capacity to enter into binding contracts under the laws of the Republic of Guatemala. By registering, you confirm that you meet these requirements.
 Location: EasyStore is designed for businesses operating in Guatemala. By creating an account, you agree that your business is legally established and operating within the Guatemalan territory.
Terms.accountRegistration:
2.2. Account Registration
Accurate Information: You must provide complete, accurate and updated information during the account registration process. This includes, but is not limited to, your legal name, company name, a valid email address, tax identification number (TIN) if applicable, and any other requested information. EasyStore reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if the information provided is false, inaccurate, incomplete or outdated.
Verification: We may request additional documentation to verify your identity or that of your business, in order to comply with applicable regulations in Guatemala and to ensure the security of the platform.
Terms.accountResponsibility:
2.3. Account Responsibility
Confidentiality: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your EasyStore username and password. You must not share your login credentials with any third party.
Account Activity: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account, regardless of whether they are performed by you or by an authorized or unauthorized third party. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. EasyStore will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this obligation.
Terms.accountRestrictions:
2.4. Restrictions on Use
Lawful Purpose: Your EasyStore account must be used exclusively for lawful business purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations in Guatemala.
Prohibition of Fraudulent Accounts: It is strictly prohibited to create fraudulent accounts or use the platform for illegal, fraudulent, deceptive or malicious activities. Any suspicious activity or activity that violates these Terms will result in immediate suspension or termination of your account.
Terms.generalP1: The use of EasyStore implies acceptance of the following general conditions governing the operation and content within the platform:
Terms.generalP2:
3.1. Purpose of EasyStore
EasyStore is a SaaS (Software as a Service) platform that facilitates users to create, manage and operate their own online stores. Our main function is to provide the technological tools for Guatemalan merchants to display and sell their products and services in the digital environment. EasyStore does not act as a seller, sales intermediary, or as a party in commercial transactions between users (merchants) and their customers.
Terms.generalP3:
3.2. Responsibility for Content
You are solely responsible for all content that you upload, post, publish, display, link to or otherwise make available through your store on EasyStore. This includes, but is not limited to, product information (descriptions, prices, images), text, graphics, videos, audios and any other digital material. You warrant that you have the necessary rights to all content you use and that the content you use is legal, accurate, truthful, complete and does not violate the rights of third parties, including intellectual property rights, trademarks or privacy rights. EasyStore assumes no responsibility for user‑generated content.
Terms.generalP4:
3.3. Compliance with Laws
• E‑commerce laws.
• Consumer protection laws and consumer rights.
• Fiscal and tax laws (such as VAT and ISR, as applicable).
• Personal data protection laws (to the extent they exist or are indirectly applicable in Guatemala, such as the Law on Access to Public Information and international principles).
• Regulations specific to the type of products or services you sell (food, drugs, regulated products).
• Advertising and promotion laws.
Failure to comply with these laws may result in the suspension or termination of your account, in addition to any legal sanctions that may be imposed by Guatemalan authorities.
Terms.generalP5:
3.4. Prohibited Conduct
• Upload, post or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, or otherwise objectionable.
• Distribute or transmit computer viruses, worms, Trojan horses, cancelbots or other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any telecommunications software or hardware.
• Interfere with or disrupt the servers or networks connected to EasyStore, or disobey any requirements, procedures, policies or regulations of the networks connected to the platform.
• Engage in “phishing”, “spamming”, “spoofing” or any other form of manipulation that compromises the security or integrity of the platform or other users.
• Impersonate any person or entity, or misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity.
• Sell products or services that are illegal or whose sale is prohibited in Guatemala.
Terms.generalP6:
3.5. EasyStore Intellectual Property Rights
All right, title and interest in and to the EasyStore platform, including, but not limited to, the software, source code, user interface, designs, graphics, logos, trademarks (such as "EasyStore"), patents, copyrights and any other copyrightable subject matter, are the exclusive property of EasyStore (or its licensors). These Terms do not grant you any rights to EasyStore's intellectual property, except for the limited right to use the Platform in accordance with these Terms.
Terms.generalP7:
3.6. User Intellectual Property Rights
You retain all right, title and interest in and to the content you upload to your EasyStore. However, by uploading content to the platform, you grant us a worldwide, non‑exclusive, royalty‑free, sublicensable and transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display and perform such content in connection with the operation and promotion of EasyStore and its services. This license terminates when you delete your content or your account, unless your content has been shared with third parties and they have not deleted it.
Terms.generalP8:
3.7. Indemnification
You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless EasyStore, its directors, officers, employees, agents, licensors and service providers, against any claims, demands, actions, damages, losses, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to:
• Your use of the EasyStore platform.
• Any violation of these Terms or applicable laws and regulations by you.
• The content you upload or make available through your store.
• Any third party claims related to the products or services you offer through your store.
Terms.paymentsIntro: To access and maintain your online store on EasyStore, you need to pay the fees associated with your service plan. Here we explain how it works:
Terms.paymentsPlans:
4.1. Plans and Pricing
EasyStore offers different service plans with varying features and prices. You can check the details of each plan, including the features they offer and their corresponding fees, on our website. We reserve the right to change the prices and features of the plans at any time. We will notify you at least 30 days in advance of any changes that affect your current plan.
Terms.paymentsCycle:
4.2. Billing Cycle
EasyStore services are billed on a monthly or yearly basis, depending on the billing cycle you use from the date you activate your account. Payment will be automatically charged to your registered payment method at the beginning of each billing cycle. It is your responsibility to ensure that your payment method is up to date and has sufficient funds.
Terms.paymentsTaxes:
4.3. Taxes
All EasyStore fees are shown in U.S. dollars. It is your sole responsibility to pay all applicable taxes, including Value Added Tax (VAT) and any other local or national taxes applicable to the services provided by EasyStore or the sales you make through your store. The prices shown may not include taxes, which will be added to the final invoice in accordance with current Guatemalan tax legislation.
Terms.paymentsMethods:
4.4. Payment Methods
We accept the following payment methods for EasyStore fees: bank transfers. By providing your payment method information, you authorize us to charge the fees corresponding to that method.
Terms.paymentsSuspension:
4.5. Non-Payment and Suspension
If your subscription payment is not processed successfully for any reason (e.g. insufficient funds, expired card), we will try to charge you again. If after 3 attempts payment is not made, we reserve the right to temporarily suspend access to your store and EasyStore services until payment is cleared. If the situation of non-payment persists, your account may be permanently cancelled, losing access to all the information and content of your store.
Terms.paymentsRefunds:
4.6. Refunds and Cancellations
EasyStore fees are non-refundable, unless explicitly stated otherwise in these Terms or in a specific promotion. You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account control panel. Cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing cycle, and no additional charges will be incurred thereafter. No refunds will be issued for unused time in the current billing cycle.
Terms.thirdPartyIntro: EasyStore seeks to provide you with a robust and flexible platform, which often involves integration with third party products and services.
Terms.thirdPartyIntegrations:
5.1. Integrations and Third Party Applications
Our platform may allow you to integrate or use services, applications, payment gateways, themes or tools provided by third parties. These integrations are optional and their use is subject to the specific terms and conditions of such third parties. It is your responsibility to review and agree to those terms before using their services.
Terms.thirdPartyLiability:
5.2. Limitation of Liability for Third Parties
EasyStore does not endorse or guarantee the availability, functionality, security or performance of any third party products or services. We are not responsible for any damage or loss arising from your interaction with or use of such third party services, including, but not limited to, service interruptions, errors, loss of data or security issues. Any concerns or disputes related to third party services should be directed directly to the provider of such service.
Terms.confidentialityIntro: At EasyStore, we take the protection of your and your customers' data very seriously.
Terms.privacyPolicySection:
6.1. Privacy Policy
The manner in which EasyStore collects, uses, discloses and protects your and your customers' personal information is detailed in our Privacy Policy. We invite you to review it carefully. By agreeing to these Terms, you also agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy. We strive to comply with best practices in data protection, considering the existing guidelines in Guatemala, such as the Law of Access to Public Information, and international principles of data protection.
Terms.merchantDataSection:
6.2. Merchant and Merchant's Customer Data
By using EasyStore, you act as the "data controller" of your customers' personal information (e.g. names, shipping addresses, emails). EasyStore acts as the "data processor" on your behalf, handling that data to operate your store and provide you with necessary functionality (such as order management). You are responsible for obtaining appropriate consent from your customers for the collection and use of their data, as well as for complying with all applicable Guatemalan privacy laws regarding the handling of their information.
Terms.terminationIntro: We know that your business needs may change. Here we explain how cancellation and termination of your EasyStore account works:
Terms.terminationUserSection:
7.1. Termination by User
You can cancel your EasyStore account at any time from your store's administration panel. Once you request cancellation, your account will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle that you have already paid for. After this period, your store will be deactivated and you will no longer have access to EasyStore services. No additional charges will be made from the effective date of cancellation.
Terms.terminationEasyStoreSection:
7.2. Termination by EasyStore
EasyStore reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to the services, in whole or in part, at any time and for any reason, including, but not limited to:
• Failure to comply with any of these Terms and Conditions.
• Fraudulent, illegal or harmful activities to EasyStore, other users or third parties.
• Violation of intellectual property rights.
• Failure to pay applicable fees.
• If required by law or court order.
In the event of termination by EasyStore due to a serious violation of these Terms, no refund will be issued for fees already paid.
Terms.terminationEffectsSection:
7.3. Effects of Termination
Upon termination of your account, either by your decision or by EasyStore's termination:
• Your right to use EasyStore's services will cease immediately.
• Your online store will no longer be accessible to the public.
• EasyStore may delete all content associated with your account after a period of 30 days to allow you to download your information. It is your responsibility to back up your content prior to termination. EasyStore will not be liable for loss of data upon cancellation or termination of the account.
• Any outstanding payment obligations will remain due and payable.
Terms.noWarrantiesSection:
8.1. No Warranties
EasyStore is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. This includes, but is not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. We do not warrant that EasyStore's services will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, error-free or that any defects will be corrected. Your use of the Platform is at your own risk.
Terms.limitsOfLiabilitySection:
8.2. Limits of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by Guatemalan law, EasyStore, its directors, employees, agents, suppliers and licensors shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data or other intangible losses (even if EasyStore has been advised of the possibility of such damages), resulting from:
• The use or inability to use the EasyStore services.
• The cost of procurement of substitute goods and services resulting from any goods, data, information or services purchased or obtained or messages received or transactions conducted through or from the services.
• Unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data.
• Statements or conduct of any third party on the Services.
• Any other matter related to the services.
In no event shall EasyStore's total liability to you for all damages, losses and causes of action exceed the amount paid by you to EasyStore during the twelve (12) months prior to the date the claim arose.
Terms.miscIntro: Here are other important terms that govern your relationship with EasyStore:
Terms.miscGoverningLawSection:
9.1. Governing Law
These Terms and any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or your use of EasyStore shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Guatemala, without giving effect to its conflict of laws principles.
Terms.miscJurisdictionSection:
9.2. Jurisdiction and Dispute Resolution
Any controversy or claim arising out of or related to these Terms or the use of EasyStore's services shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent Courts of Guatemala City, Republic of Guatemala. The parties expressly waive any other jurisdiction that may correspond to them by reason of their present or future domicile. Before resorting to judicial proceedings, the parties agree to attempt to resolve any dispute in good faith through direct negotiation.
Terms.miscSeverabilitySection:
9.3. Severability
If any provision of these Terms shall be deemed unlawful, void or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, such provision shall be deemed severable from these Terms and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provisions.
Terms.miscEntireAgreementSection:
9.4. Entire Agreement
These Terms, together with EasyStore's Privacy Policy and any other legal notices published by EasyStore on the Platform, constitute the entire agreement between you and EasyStore with respect to the use of the Services, and supersede any prior or contemporaneous agreements, communications or proposals, whether oral or written, between you and EasyStore.
Terms.miscAssignmentSection:
9.5. Assignment
You may not assign or transfer these Terms, or any of your rights or obligations hereunder, without the prior written consent of EasyStore. EasyStore may assign or transfer these Terms and its rights and obligations without restriction.
Terms.miscNoticesSection:
9.6. Notices
Any notice or communication that EasyStore is required or permitted to send to you under these Terms will be made by email to the email address registered in your account. The notice will be deemed received when it is sent by email or posted on the Platform. It is your responsibility to keep your contact information up to date.

Errors.title: Error
Errors.generic-description: Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
Errors.network-error: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
Errors.unauthorized-error: You are not authorized to perform this action.

Errors.bad-request-error: The request was invalid. Please check the data and try again.
Errors.not-found-error: The requested resource was not found.
Errors.invalidCredentialsDescription: Please check your email and password and try again.
Errors.accountLockedDescription: Your account is temporarily locked for 10 minutes due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later.
Errors.associatedAccountDescription: An account with this email address already exists. Please log in or use a different email address.

Errors.dimensionRequiredForPhysicalDescription: Physical products must include dimensions (height, width, length). Please add the required dimensions.

Errors.variantNotFoundDescription: The product variant you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.
